name: Vermont Kids Data MCP Tools
description: MCP tools for accessing Vermont Kids Data functions

tools.name: list_functions
tools.description: Returns a list of all available function definitions with their descriptions and parameter schemas

type.description: The type of tool, always 'function' for these tools

description.description: A detailed description of what the function does

parameters.description: The parameter schema for the function

tools.name: execute_function
tools.description: Executes a specific function by name with the provided parameters

functionName.description: The name of the function to execute

parameters.description: The parameters to pass to the function, as defined in the function's parameter schema

returns.description: The result of the function execution, typically containing 'value' and 'url' properties

function.name: children_in_poverty_under_12_all-chart
function.description: Determine percent of children in poverty within Vermont for a given year...

location.description: The location, either a Building Bright Futures region within Vermont, or across the entire state...

year.description: The year of interest. Should be greater than or equal to 2017...
